/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with bare trees, their branches reaching out into the sky, creating a stark contrast against the overcast sky. The buildings on either side of the street are painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the otherwise monochrome landscape. The street itself is mostly empty, with only a few cars and trucks parked along the sides. In the distance, a large body of water can be seen, adding a serene element to the bustling cityscape.
